name: Crowns RPG, Things that Feed on Corpses
name_original: Crowns RPG, Things that Feed on Corpses
description:
The flesh rots, the blood dries, the bones wither,

Starving beasts stalk in the moonlight,

Waiting for a chance to feast on what cannot fight back...

Crunching Bones, Rending Flesh

This text is a 6-page expansion for the Crowns RPG that provides monster stat blocks for 8 flesh-eating monsters for adventurers to encounter:

  • Bloodmoss
  • Carrion Beasts, Small
  • Carrion Beasts, Large
  • Barrow Spiders
  • Corpse Jellies
  • Ghouls
  • Grotesques
  • Wardens

Along with in-depth descriptions of each monster's place in the world, six possible variants of each monster (except one), and an exploration of sarcophagy, the affliction that turns men into ghouls.

This booklet also comes with an analysis of the hedonistic cannibal cults that persist throughout the world, ideas for dungeons built on burial places, and entries for the stalwart guardian monsters that watch over the dead.

Check out the full game at: https://pixelamerica.itch.io/crowns

The Season of Crows

The Season of Crows is a series of rules expansions being written for Crowns that will (at the end of all 9 releases) be compiled into a single text that will be available for physical print.

If you'd like to pre-order the rest of the texts by purchasing the combined pdf right now, follow this link: https://ward-against-evil.itch.io/crowns-rpg-season-of-crows
